structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

text.section: Except as indicated under subsection (2) of this section, every passenger elevator, freight elevator, moving sidewalk, fixed guideway system, and escalator shall be inspected once every twelve (12) months.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 24, effective July 1, 2011. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 232, sec. 4. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 10.
